result.execSummary:
On one or more charges, the deferred prosecution or sentencing agreement(s) on this case were fulfilled, and the charge(s) were dismissed.

The defendant Armando S. HERRERA was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • 4th Degree Sexual Assault, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.225(3m).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

miscConds.notes: If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.
Maintain full-time work/job search as able.

Pay supervision fees in an amount to be determined by the Department of Corrections.

Assessment, treatment, counseling as deemed appropriate by the Department's assessment process.

Have no contact with C.D.M.;

Have no contact with children unless approved by agent, with the exception of his own biological children, as approved by DHS.  

Submit DNA sample.

Notice of Motion and Motion to Prohibit Contact Between Gilberto Herrera and Certain Individuals Pursuant to Sec. 940.47, Wis. Stats.

Order Prohibiting Contact Between the Defendant and Certain Individuals Pursuant to Section 940.47, Wis. Stats.
The Court hereby orders, pursuant to Section 940.47, that the defendant is prohibited from communicating with, and shall remain a distance of 300 feet from, the following individuals:
1) CDM, DOB: 07-10-04; ONP, DOB: 03-06-06; MLP, DOB: 07-02-10; AJP, DOB: 12-21-03; GP, DOB: 11-26-04; CP, DOB: 03-04-06; Kristin Peters and Gilberto Herrera.
Order Denying Defendant's Motion to Modify Bail.

Order Denying, in Part, and Granting, In Part, the State's Motion to Modify Bail.
The State's motion to modify bail by increasing cash bail is denied.
The State's motion to modify bail by adding a condition that the defendant have no contact with Gilberto Herrera is granted.

MOTION TO MODIFY BAIL - 
Defendant in custody.
The parties argue the motion.
The Court comments and denies the defense motion to modify bail and denies the States motion to increase bail.  Bail will remain at $5,000.00 cash per case.
The request for a condition of no contact with Gilberto Herrera is granted and per section 940.47, the court will also  impose an order prohibiting contact between the defendant and the persons previously mentioned that he have no contact with, which now includes Gilberto Herrera, and is prohibited from communicating with, and shall maintain a distance of 300 feet from these individuals.
Amended Commitment for Failure to Furnish Bail issued.  Copy filed.
State to draft order.

RE:  O.N.P., DOB: 03-04-2006, between June 1, 2013 and December 31, 2014.

Defendant in custody.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crimes of 2 counts 1st degree sexual assault of child.  The matters are continued for initial appearance on 05-18-15 at 2:30 p.m.  Bail is set at $5,000.00 cash with the conditions that he report to the Manitowoc City Police Department for fingerprints, photographs and other identifying information within 24 hours of release and have no contact with C.D.M., DOB: 07-10-2004; O.N.P., DOB: 03-04-2006; M.L.P., DOB: 07-02-2010; A.J.P., DOB: 12-21-2003; G.P., DOB: 11-26-2004; C.P., DOB: 03-04-2006 and Kristin Peters or any premises they occupy and no contact with anyone under the age of 18.  Bail not furnished and the defendant is remanded into custody.  Commitment for failure to furnish bail issued.  Copy filed.
